summary: Seok-joong, a farmer in his mid thirties falls head over heels in love with local tabang delivery girl Eun-ha, but the couple's marital bliss is short lived as Eun-ha tests positive for HIV.
cast: Do-yeon Jeon|Jung-min Hwang|Moon-hee Na|Seung-su Ryu|Su-hee Go|Do-bin Baek|Jong-hak Baek|Sin-ho Byeon|Hyo-eun Hwang|Yu-seok Jeong|Bu-seon Kim|Myung-kyu Park|Ju-hie Seo|Su-hyeon Sin
keywords: mother son relationship|world cup|wedding|waterbed|voice over narration
title: Neoneun nae unmyeong
